messages: edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (19:55): maybe I should announce Web DOM Core to www-dom or some such
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (19:56): hmm, public-webapps has far more subscribers
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (19:56): I'd announce it on public-webapps.
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (19:57): yeah
6b57ea7f33069df5914663ba9e59afdf (19:58): keyboard d-n-d was removed from the draft some time ago, right?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:00): no
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:00): oh wait, yes
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:00): sorry, thought you meant copy/paste for some odd reason
6b57ea7f33069df5914663ba9e59afdf (20:01): I meant really the drag and drop, which used to be defined for keyboard too
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:01): right
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (20:01): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: You should probably let the htmlwg know too
6b57ea7f33069df5914663ba9e59afdf (20:01): the draft is just so difficult to read that you never know whether the feature is defined somewhere..
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:02): not very constructive
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:03): http://html5.org/tools/web-apps-tracker?from=4643&to=4644
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:04): was the change
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:04): it was commented out
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:06): why does Google not do timezone conversion?
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (20:06): In what context?
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (20:06): it does
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:07): it does? e.g. a query like "10am pdt in utc"
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (20:07): it's not very intuitive syntax unfortunately
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:08): what do you use?
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (20:08): Well, I know you can use "time in X" to find the current time.  I don't know what the syntax is for arbitrary conversion.
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (20:09): yeah maybe there's no arbitrary conversion
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (20:16): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: Use everytimezone.com
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (20:16): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: Also, do you have a link to an explanation of the CSSOM Values API?
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (20:17): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: http://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=10am+pdt+in+utc
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (20:17): That'll give you more information than you likely wanted to know
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:18): 1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb, http://lists.w3.org/Archives/Public/www-style/2010Aug/0617.html is the best I've got
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:18): 1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb, including the follow up email from Boris and then me again
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (20:19): kk.  I wanted to show it around the office.
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:21): sweet
1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (20:22): We've been wanting to push a non-sucky interface between CSS and JS for a bit now.
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (20:23): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: you should ask hyatt about it
65325d50b2e25aca54bc871b89758c9c (20:23): he's on #webkit right now, though he may be watching the Apple event streaming video
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:24): i am too
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:24): and the question is on www-style, which hyatt reads to some extent
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:25): but I will do that once I work on CSSOM again if he hasn't followed up himself
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (20:25): playing with DOM Core now
